item.title: potatOS
item.description: Github I developed an x86_64 operating system and kernel from scratch. The OS has virtual memory and threading implemented. Links: Github
item.content:
Github

I developed an x86_64 operating system and kernel from scratch. The OS has virtual memory and threading implemented.

Links:

  • Github
